A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Movie has NO payoffs that was set up from the Force Awakens. None. Forced slapstick humor\, including \"Your Momma\" & \"Can You Hear Me Now\" jokes. People able to breath and operate in space\, introducing hyperspace as a weapon now (why not just create autopilot x-wings to hyperspace into ships?). The movie just ruins everything that the past SW Movies have taught us. A lot of liberal messages as well.... in a SW movie. In a MOVIE. Will not see anymore from here on out.
